snippet.title: Gravity Ghost: Deluxe Edition - COMING AUGUST 6 to PS4
snippet.description:
Surf the night sky. Careen through the cosmos. Find the fox. Don’t miss this genre-defying journey through the heart of the galaxy. Gravity Ghost: Deluxe Edition - COMING TO PS4 AUGUST 6 

When a ghost girl’s best friend goes missing, she’ll turn the whole universe upside down to find him. Set in a beautiful hand-painted world, Gravity Ghost is a planetary platformer where orbiting is an art form. In more than 100 dizzying levels, you’ll put your aerial skills to the test against planets that bounce, break, splash, spin, repel, and more. 

Winner of Paste Magazine’s #1 Best Videogame Soundtrack of the year, Gravity Ghost is filled with 100% original tracks by Ben Prunty, composer of FTL.

Animated in a charming storybook style, and voiced by Emmy Award-winning actress Ashly Burch (Horizon Zero Dawn, Life is Strange), and voice-over artist Logan Cunningham (Bastion, Transistor), Gravity Ghost is a surprisingly human story about how love, like gravity, invisibly holds us together even as life threatens to pull us apart.

Landing on the PlayStation 4 on August 6, 2019


Please note: At the current time, the game will be available in the PlayStation Store in North America only
